Caption

Global variables

$thumbnail-caption-class: #{$thumbnail-class}#{$caption-class} $thumbnail-caption-padding: $base-padding-vertical * 2 $thumbnail-caption-font-size: 80%

Add widget -thumbnail-caption to add caption to image. Don't forget about themes and sizes.

Use semantic elements <figure> and <figcaption>!

Caption position

To change it just add modifiers _left_ and _right_. Captions are responsive, try to change window width.

Left and right captions are absolute positioned. So it looks great if there is nothing on left or right side of the thumbnail.
